bike.description: 6061 TIG-welded aluminum, Hudson laid-back design with low ride height, internal cable routing, alloy kickstand
bike.paint_description: M: Candy Apple Red, Gloss Black  or TigerJAMIS_SINGLEQUOTEs Eye   S/T: Azurite Blue, Candy Apple Red or Cucumber

components.description: Alex C1000 alloy rims, 36H, Formula alloy nutted front & Shimano Nexus 3-speed rear hubs, 14g black stainless steel spokes
Jamis Sport Comfort, 26 x 1.95", with whitewalls or skinwalls
Forged alloy crank, single 42T chainring, 170mm, with full length chainguard
Hi-rise comfort, 15JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 80mm rise x 640mm wide
Alloy micro-adjust, 31.6 x 300mm, with alloy QR clamp
Jamis Comfort with extra foam padding, synthetic suede top, burnished side panels and bumper springs
